export function updateTodos(obj) {
  const { todo, isCompleted } = obj;
  return fetch(`${BASE_URL}/todos/${obj.id}`, {
    method: 'PUT',
    headers: {
      'Content-Type': 'application/json',
      Authorization: `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('access_token')}`,
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({
      todo,
      isCompleted,
    }),
  });
